name: Throwable A.N.T.s
description:
Throwable A.N.T.s is a VR-Action game, where the player plays a robot ant crafting resources for the robot-ant-queen. To get resources it is necessary to throw smaller robot ants to the resources pools. All this under a tight time limit results in fun action gameplay. 

The game was developed in the first two semesters of the games engineering course at the Julius-Maximilians-University Würzburg.
